title: What are some futuristic weapons that exist that are correctly predicted in science fiction novels? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not novels but here are (off the top of my head) two stories: In “The Land Ironclads”, H.G. Wells predicted tank warfare. In “Deadline”, Cleve Cartmill described an atomic weapon so similar to the one being developed by the Manhattan Project that the FBI investigated the magazine where it was published to make sure they weren’t spies.
